_meanings:
{@--1@} Seizing, holding, taking,
grasping; {#Asanarajjuparigrahe#} <ls>R. 9. 46</ls>; 

{#SaMkAparigrahaH#} <ls>Mu. 1.</ls> ‘taking or 
entertaining a doubt’.

{@--12@} The seraglio or 
household of a king, harem.

{@--33@} (In <ab>Ved.</ab>
Gram.) The double mention of
a word both before and after {#iti#}.

{@--36@} The eclipse
of the sun or moon.
